TopicTitle: [Video] Fan Made A Kerbal Space Program Gameplay Trailer

Articles.Content:
I've been wanting to improve on my attempt to make a good KSP gameplay Trailer. So here it is I produced new music just for this video. Hope you guys like it.

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/T-DrSFrmJsg?feature=player_profilepage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Nice! Kinda sad it ended so soon though. Also, a tip, hit F4 to turn off the vehicles markers if you make another video.

Nice! Kinda sad it ended so soon though. Also, a tip, hit F4 to turn off the vehicles markers if you make another video.

Thanks. bah F4. I'll have to remember that if I do another one. Yeah, my target was about a minute I cut a lot of stuff out.
